ai-tika-s0303t6:2_0: I say: “I am like this, it is like that.” “I am doing so,” or “I can attain such states.”
ai-tika-s0303t6:2_1: When this happens, why are they not?
ai-tika-s0303t6:2_2: Though he has given up all, he is surely abandoned all,
ai-tika-s0303t6:3_0: The Accomplishment of seclusion is finished.
ai-tika-s0303t6:5_1: “Abscesses” is said in the same way as before.
ai-tika-s0303t6:6_0: in the monastery, or in the land of the monastery, or intimation of seeds, etc., that is to say, the ground of knowledge and conduct, holy, and the rest.
ai-tika-s0303t6:6_1: and to give their own opportunity to them.
ai-tika-s0303t6:6_2: Herein, as to going (therefore): the Dispensation of the Three Worlds
ai-tika-s0303t6:6_3: thus he told the Thera about the scriptures, whose mind was pleasant and unpleasant, who had heard the word of the heart, regardless of the Dhamma, having heard the Faith, said, “As authority, the Dhamma, the Elders, among the Dispensation, noble ones, and so on.”
ai-tika-s0303t6:8_0: The Linked Discourses on Sāriputta is finished.
